definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fly, Aramaism, si vera l. (NH id., esp. fly away; Aram. [[פְּרַח]], prah. fly; porah.to0 insect, bird);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[לְפׂרְחוֹת]] Ez Eze 13:20, Eze 13:20 for (like ?) flying things, i. e. birds, but del. LXX SyrVer Hi Siegf in v:a (where prob. ins. from v:b); Co Toy Berthol Krae in v:a; v:b.
